briefTitle: A Phase III Multinational Multicenter Investigator-Masked Randomized Active-Controlled Trial Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of DE-130A With Xalatan® in Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
officialTitle: A Phase III, Multinational, Multicenter, Investigator-Masked, Randomized, Active Controlled Trial, Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of DE-130A With Xalatan® in Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension Over a 3-Month Period, Followed by a 12-Month Follow-Up With Open-Label DE-130A Treatment.
summary: A Phase III, Multinational, Multicenter, Investigator-Masked, Randomized, Active-Controlled Trial, comparing the efficacy and safety of DE-130A with Xalatan® in Patients with Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension over a 3-Month period, followed by a 12-Month Follow-Up with Open-Label DE-130A Treatment.
